post_content:
All prices include shipping and insurance (within the US) and assume a no-fee payment method.  If you'd like to use Paypal Goods and Services, that's fine, just add 3.5%.  I have to collect sales tax from Washington state buyers.

King $400
Lafitte $375
Foster $369
Hart $150
Bernhard $95

Edit, my bad, I thought the Hart was an OMSL. I will let someone else grab it

That Lafitte is too beautiful for my binder.
